channel.title: Free Andriod Apps With pictures
channel.description:
How to get Free Android apps Without
go to www.apkmania.co [img]http://i.imgur.com/oLpXp.png[/img]
search for the app you want then dl it I used Modern Combat For Example btw it's an adfly link
then you see an zippyshare website with all the information about your app Click on Download [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nAlRY.png[/img] your Download Will start
Sometimes you see (appname).txt change txt to apk And other times It Will be an .APK [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/b7BQZ.png[/img]
If you Do This On pc Send the File To ur Phone by Gmail Or The Usb
And at last Click on the File (it will not Install unless you change it to .apk) Press Ok. I will instal your Application
Have fun (i Can't post pictures of the instalation The school took my mobile)
